Hi everyone I'm threethirty, I've been using Linux since 2002 , went Linux only in 2004, and have been using Ubuntu since Warty.  I am a registered Linux user (#404601), a registered Ubuntu user (#3941), the founding member of the Richmond Linux Users Group (richmondlug.googlepages.com), and a member of the Richmond Open Source Community (richmondcomputes.org).  

I have a blog at threethirty.us.  And I contribute to two other blogs Something Kinda Techy (somethingkindatechy.blogspot.com) and RLUG's Ubuntu Help Blog (rlugubuntuhelp.blogspot.com)

I also am a podcaster Im the MC of linuxcranks (http://linuxcranks.info) I'm a regular contributor on Hacker Public Radio (http://hackerpublicradio.org), and I have a podcast that only happens when I am walking home called Onamove (http://channels.ourmedia.org/onamove-podcast/feed)

Anything else you may want to know about me can be found in my geek code...
